name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: VEXA: AI for Google Meet and Knowledge Organization

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI assistant that enhances meetings in real-time and builds a unified knowledge base for quick insights and deep research.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No bots joining your calls: VEXA doesn’t join meetings as a separate participant, ensuring a seamless and uninterrupted experience.

Key Features:

Real-Time Enhancements: Access live meeting transcriptions, key highlights, and instant AI-powered Q&A.

Unified Knowledge Base: Automatically build a searchable knowledge base across all your meetings, capturing every discussion point, decision, and shared resource. This unified knowledge base allows you to draw connections between different meetings, providing a holistic view of ongoing projects and topics.

Effortless Insights: Quickly find answers and uncover deep insights from past conversations. VEXA’s AI can identify patterns, highlight recurring themes, and extract actionable insights, making it easier to conduct deep research and understand the context of ongoing discussions.

Multilingual Support: Works in over 99 languages for seamless global collaboration.

Automated Reports & Follow-Ups: Generate summaries, action items, and detailed reports effortlessly. Use the collected knowledge to create comprehensive follow-ups, ensuring no detail is missed and every stakeholder remains informed.

Deep Research and Analysis: Utilize VEXA’s AI chat to conduct deep research on competitors, evaluate performance, and analyze customer development interviews. Leverage the knowledge accumulated across multiple meetings to generate monthly reports and gain strategic insights effortlessly.

Why Choose VEXA?

VEXA doesn’t just enhance your meetings in real-time—it transforms them into a powerful resource for actionable insights and knowledge research. With advanced knowledge extraction capabilities, VEXA helps you go beyond just recording information—it empowers you to explore and analyze your meeting data deeply. Ideal for professionals, teams, and managers, VEXA ensures every meeting contributes to a growing, searchable repository of valuable information, enabling better decision-making and strategic planning.

Upgrade your Google Meet experience with VEXA: Real-Time Productivity, Unified Knowledge, and Smarter Meetings.
